articles.description: Bosses say the £2 increase is expected to generate TfL additional income of up to £27m per year.
articles.content:
All Tube and Elizabeth line fares between central London and Heathrow Airport will increase to the peak rate.
The changes will come into force on 4 September and will see the charge for a new Oyster… [+1970 chars]
